forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine to start, then a few afternoon clouds. High 16C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny to partly cloudy. High 61F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies this evening will become overcast overnight. Low near 10C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. Low near 50F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. High 16C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. High 61F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early with showers later at night. Low 12C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early with showers later at night. Low 53F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 13C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 56F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening, then cloudy overnight. Low 9C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening, then cloudy overnight. Low 48F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High near 15C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 59F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 7C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low around 45F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy. High 18C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly cloudy. High around 65F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies. Low 12C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. Low 53F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional showers for the afternoon. High near 15C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with showers for the afternoon hours. High 59F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening becoming more intermittent overnight. Low around 10C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming less numerous late. Low 49F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 16C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High around 60F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with showers at times. Low around 10C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional showers. Low 49F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.
